hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SERVERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the server name to query for a certificate

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CERTALIAS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Alias for this certificate in the trustStore

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [-f /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/application.truststore ] ; then set +e keytool -v -delete -alias $CERTALIAS -keystore /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/application.truststore -storepass password set -e fi
echo | openssl s_client -showcerts -servername $SERVERNAME -connect $SERVERNAME:443 2>&1 | openssl x509 -text | sed -ne '/-BEGIN CERTIFICATE-/,/-END CERTIFICATE-/p' > server.crt
keytool -import -noprompt -trustcacerts -keystore /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/application.truststore -storepass password -alias $CERTALIAS -file server.crt
rm server.crt
